attributes.action: sack Douglas Alexander MP immediately owing to his responsibility for the May 2007 Scottish Parliament Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government commissioned report by Ron Gould on the May 2007 Scottish Parliament Election detailed numerous shortcomings that disenfranchised thousands of Scottish voters. We the undersigned call on the Prime Minister to remove Douglas Alexander MP from his cabinet position owing to his responsibility for the election as Secretary of State for Scotland at the time.
